amendment.description: To increase funding for the EPA for Clean Water State Revolving Fund and the Safe Drinking Water State Revolving Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 317 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 317 proposed by Senator Crapo. (consideration: CR S4233-4235; text: CR S4233) To increase funding for the EPA for Clean Water State Revolving Fund and the Safe Drinking Water State Revolving Fund.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 317 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 317 proposed by Senator Crapo.
